file_content.text: The path is clear. I must guide the walkers.
The path must be cleansed.
Suva-Rak? I'm interested in taking the path of pilgrimage.
Outsiders are not Voss. They do not follow the path.
Even the pilgrims cannot follow now. The danger is too great.
Outsider. You carry weapons. You can help.
I am Suva-Rak. I guide pilgrims down the path.
The path is blocked. The Gormak kill any who enter.
Why would the Gormak attack here?
Pilgrims are no threat.
War. They strike where they do most harm.
They can't kill me.
Many others must travel the path.
This is a big place. You and your pilgrims can avoid them.
Find a new path, then.
The path leads to the Shrine of Healing. Only those who believe may enter.
Even Mystics walk the path before their trials. The Gormak defile it.
I'd be more than willing to clear out the Gormak.
I can stop them.
It is not enough to spill blood.
What's involved in the Mystics' trials?
The trials, huh?
I do not know. Few do.
Enough, I get it.
The Gormak have tainted the path. A Voss must cleanse the shrine.
The Gormak will attack. Will you guide a pilgrim?
Send the pilgrims with me. I'll keep them safe.
Of course I will.
I would be honored to restore the path.
I'm eager to begin.
Make sure the pilgrims follow my lead.
I'll do my best.
I'm no pilgrim, but I'll keep your people alive.
Sure, why not?
Watch and learn.
Let us hope so.
The Gormak are predators. Move quickly.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
Until the path is restored, no one may enter the shrine.
Only the Voss may follow the path.
